page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content: Roads-A61 going N-S,A619 going E-W: A632 going SW-NW, M1 3 miles to East, access at junctions 29 and 30, dual carriage link road opened July 1985, 2 years ahead of schedule. Built by Balfour Beatty, cost 20m. Road traffic surveys-vehicles per hour Car Bus Lorry Van M/cycle Bicycle 852 046 042 024 006 002 Ards 224 008 020 024 010 001 Brds Bus Co. running P.S.V. in the town are C/field Trans., East Mids Motor Service, S.Yorks. Pass. Trans., Trent Motor Tract., Silver Service. C/field Trans. is financed by the Borough. Many taxi and bus firms are privately financed. Railways- Inter-city pass. service to cities N and S by diesel Branch Lines to industrial complexes pits, steel, chemicals. Traffic in 1hr 5 passengers, 4 goods.
